channel.title: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!
channel.description:
Hi i am using Demolishscape Source (LINK FOR SOURCE HERE:[url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=377106.0]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=377106.0[/url])
Okay here is my problem: ;) I open the NPCDrops i add a drop but it dont drop it and like abbysal demons drop whips that code is not there but it drop whips NPCdrops dont seems to work...And where should i add drops then? and where is the whip drop code?and all other drops code that works? I dont under stand!! :confused:
If someone can help me please answer me where is the DROP FILE?? :confused: TY ;)

item.title: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @Tension_Ltd Tension Ltd
item.description:
@Tension_Ltd wrote:

Go to npcdrops.cgi i think or npcdrops and i would just edit a drop but not make a new drop> You need to write down the monster id and then the drop and then the percent and you space these out by using the tab key because if you use the space bar it will be an error.

Ty - Zero

Read full topic
item.source: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!

item.title: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @zamorak_lord zamorak lord
item.description:
@zamorak_lord wrote:

NPCDrops.java is this code:

public class NPCDrops {
public int npcId;
public int DropType;
public int[] Items = new int[100];
public int[] ItemsN = new int[100];

public NPCDrops(int _npcId) {
    npcId = _npcId;
    for (int i = 0; i < Items.length; i++) {
        Items[i] = -1;
        ItemsN[i] = 0;
    }
}

}

NPCDrops.cfg dont work…

Read full topic
item.source: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!

item.title: Npc drops can find editing file please HELP!
item.dc:creator: @i0wn3v3ry i0wn3v3ry
item.description:
@i0wn3v3ry wrote:

Npcdrops.java.

Search for the abbysal demon code, look at one of the other drop’s, change the id of the item to 4151 (whip)

npcdrop = (npcid) TAB (dropid) TAB (amount) TAB (rate) 1 being lowest, 100 being highest if it is Delta.

Read full topic
